Synthesis Method: Induction furnace melting at 1300 °C under argon, cast in copper mold; as-cast ingot
Key Findings: Elastic modulus ~198 GPa (163–229 GPa); Young's modulus 269 GPa; good kinetics and near‑full reversibility.; Elastic modulus depends on measurement scale; ultrasonic, compression, and nanoindentation give different values.; Mean elastic modulus 198 GPa, ranging 186–215 GPa across compression cycles.; Mean indentation elastic modulus = 294 ± 60 GPa (overall) from >200 nanoindentations.
Comments: Mn addition reduces defects, enlarges cell volume and improves H diffusivity.; Samples exhibited internal cracks; DIC employed to measure strain during compression.; Alloy exhibits strong microscale heterogeneity in elastic modulus and hardness.; Four mechanical domains with distinct modulus and hardness identified.
